long_description: Use The Stick(R) Traveler Roller massager before, during and after workouts to get rid of knots and soreness in your muscles. Flexible center rod is surrounded by spindles that roll over your muscles; handles provide secure grip. Can be used to provide myofascial release and trigger point therapy. 18.5 in. length fits easily in a suitcase or backpack. The Stick(R) Traveler Roller massager includes instructions with examples of exercises.
short_description: Use The Stick(R) Traveler Roller massager before, during and after workouts to get rid of knots and soreness in your muscles.
